comments.body: As mentioned above, Bazel gets unhappy about the symlink in the repo and this is a very easy fix for this.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +37,41 @@def hazel_github_external(project, repoName, commit, sha, directory = "", name = None, **kwargs):
    args = {
        "url": "https://github.com/" + project + "/" + repoName + "/archive/" + commit + ".tar.gz",
        "sha256": sha,
        "stripPrefix": repoName + "-" + commit + directory,
